app_title: KIRICAB Tools - Free Web Tools to Streamline Your Daily Digital Tasks
app_description: KIRICAB offers free web tools to streamline your daily digital tasks, including secure password generation, Slack emoji creation, and text comparison (Diff Checker). No installation required, anyone can use them immediately. We support your online activities to be safer and more comfortable. These tools operate only on your PC, and no information is sent to the server, so you can use them with peace of mind.
hero_heading: Free Web Tools to Streamline Your Daily Digital Tasks
hero_paragraph: KIRICAB offers free web tools to streamline your daily digital tasks. No installation required, anyone can use them immediately. We support your online activities to be safer and more comfortable. These tools operate only on your PC, and no information is sent to the server, so you can use them with peace of mind.
button_diff: Go to Text Comparison Diff Tool
passgen_app_title: Secure Password Generator | Generate Strong Passwords Instantly
passgen_app_description: Generate 20 strong and secure passwords at once, combining uppercase, lowercase, numbers, and symbols. Customize length and random seed. Copy easily with a single click.
passgen_header_paragraph: Generate & Copy Strong Passwords with One Click
passgen_seo_heading: Why Do You Need Strong Passwords?
passgen_seo_paragraph1: In today's digital society, personal information and corporate data are constantly exposed to the threat of cyber attacks. Simple, easy-to-guess passwords (e.g., 'password123' or birthdays) can be cracked in seconds by brute-force attacks.
passgen_seo_paragraph2: Long passwords that randomly combine uppercase, lowercase, numbers, and symbols, like those generated by this tool, are extremely difficult to decipher and are the easiest and most effective first step to protect your accounts from unauthorized access.
passgen_seed_disabled_tooltip: Enter a random seed to enable
passgen_alert_select_symbol: Please select at least one symbol to use.
passgen_alert_select_charset: Please select at least one character type.
passgen_alert_length_mismatch: Password length must be greater than or equal to the number of selected character types ({count}).
